title: Sidney Crosby photos appear in urinals at Flyers' Wells Fargo Center
title_page: Sidney Crosby photos appear in urinals at Flyers' Wells Fargo Center
maintext:
If nothing else, Philadelphia sports fans are renowned for their class, right? After all, these are people who eat horse droppings to celebrate Super Bowl championships.
So when it comes to public protocol, we’ve found the level of the room in Philadelphia. Hence, we shouldn’t be surprised to see that Sidney Crosby’s face placed in urinals at the Wells Fargo Center.
According to Philly.com, this was not a sanctioned move by the Flyers as a team. But if that’s the case, some arena employee has gone rogue or some intrepid fan got in the building quickly and got to work fast.
